#summary Internal representation of NUL locals.
#sidebar ExpressionClassTree

Internal representation of NulLocal

= Description =

Defined by a knowledge reference (nul_xpr_knowledge#name) and a local index.
It contains a `dbgName` (debug-name), a string of its name to describe it when it has to be drawn.

== Overrides ==

=== sum_dependance ===
Because it has only one dependance it defines.
